text: "Hungry Like the Wolf" is the fifth single by English new wave band Duran Duran and taken from their second studio album Rio. It went to number 1 in Canada, number 3 in the United States, number 4 in Ireland, New Zealand and South Africa and number 5 in the United Kingdom and Australia. It won a Grammy Award in 1984. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:Duran Duran songs
title: Hungry Like the Wolf
